trans-unit.source: Contains information about an operation parameter.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> class.
Represents the parameter name.
Gets or sets the attributes of the associated operation parameter.
The <xref href="System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes"></xref> of the associated operation parameter.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Attributes"></xref> property.
Creates a shallow copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> instance.
The copy of the object.
Determines whether two <xref href="System.Object"></xref> instances are equal.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with the current object.
`true` if obj is equal, otherwise `false`.
Generates a number corresponding to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> representing the hash code value of the object.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is an In parameter; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is an In parameter; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is a locale identifier; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is a locale identifier; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is an optional parameter; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is an optional parameter; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is an Out parameter; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is an Out parameter; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is the return value for the operation; otherwise `false`.
`true` if the associated operation parameter is the return value for the operation; otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets the name of the associated operation parameter.
A string representing the name of the associated operation parameter.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Name"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the type of the associated operation parameter.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> object representing the type of the associated operation parameter.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.ParameterType"></xref> property.
Gets or sets the signature position of the associated operation parameter.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> representing the signature position of the associated operation parameter.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Position"></xref> property.
